Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; exterior: dot and billet pattern at rim above maeander band between pairs of lines; below, part of pendant roundel and elaborate rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 264, no. 557)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0473) (phase 2)
